cards.name: Living Shadow
cards.text: No attachments. Shadow (1). Stealth. Living Shadow cannot be killed. Forced Reaction: After Living Shadow bypasses a character using stealth, attach it to that character as a Condition attachment with the text: "Terminal. Attached character cannot be saved."

cards.name: Northern Pyre
cards.text: Challenges Action: If there is a Winter plot card revealed, kneel Northern Pyre to choose a participating character. Until the end of the challenge, set that character's STR to 3.
cards.flavor: The heat of the flames beat against her face, but even so she shivered.

cards.name: Theon Greyjoy
cards.text: Forced Reaction: After a player collects income, they must choose and kill a character they control. Forced Interrupt: When Theon Greyjoy leaves play, each opponent gains 2 power for their faction.
cards.designer: Card Designed by 2012 European Joust Champion, Stefano Montanari.

cards.name: Smiler
cards.text: Ambush (2). Reaction: After you win an unopposed challenge in which attached character is attacking, kneel Smiler to have attached character gain intimidate or renown until the end of the challenge.

cards.name: Ser Osfryd Kettleblack
cards.text: While you have more cards in hand than each opponent, Ser Osfryd Kettleblack gains renown.

cards.name: Slander and Lies
cards.text: Opponent's character only. Ambush (3). Terminal. You may spend each power on attached character as if it were 2 gold in your gold pool. Forced Reaction: After you lose a challenge in which attached character is participating, it gains 1 power.

cards.name: The Red Viper
cards.text: Shadow (5). Stealth. Action: During a challenge in which The Red Viper is attacking, discard 1 card from shadows to raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 until the end of the challenge. (Limit once per challenge.)

cards.name: The Viper's Spear
cards.text: Sand Snake character or The Red Viper only. During [military] challenges, attached character gets +3 STR and does not kneel when declared as an attacker against an opponent who controls more characters than you.

cards.name: Greyguard Artisan
cards.text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After Greyguard Artisan comes out of shadows, choose an attachment. Until the end of the phase, treat that attachment as if its printed text box were blank (except for Traits).

cards.name: Torch and Oil
cards.text: Reaction: After an opponent draws a card or marshals a card into shadows, kneel Torch and Oil to reveal that card. If it is a character, you may sacrifice Torch and Oil to discard that card and stand attached character.
cards.flavor: Up above another fire was blooming. The old wooden steps had drunk up oil like a sponge.

cards.name: Northern Patriarch
cards.text: Immune to opponents' Omen plot effects. Interrupt: When the effects of an opponent's event would initiate, cancel those effects unless that player moves 1 power from a card they control to Northern Patriarch. (Max once per round.)
cards.designer:
Card design by 2012 World Champion, Derek Shoemaker.
In Memory of Guy Gray.

cards.name: Winterfell Kennels
cards.text: Each Direwolf character you control gets +1 STR. Challenges Action: Kneel Winterfell Kennels to put a Direwolf card into play from your hand. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, place it on the bottom of your deck.
cards.designer: Card Designed by 2023 Stahleck Melee Champion, David Kennedy.

cards.name: White Graces
cards.text: Interrupt: When White Graces is discarded from your hand or deck, place it on a unique Lady or Grace character as a duplicate instead of placing it in your discard pile.
cards.flavor: They made for a pretty portrait, the proud old woman all in green surrounded by the little girls robed and veiled in white, armored in their innocence.

cards.name: Poisoned Locusts
cards.text:
Opponent's character only. Shadow (0). Terminal.
While attached character is participating in a challenge, it gets -1 STR for each attachment it has and is killed if its STR is 0.
cards.flavor: “You ought to try a few yourself, my love.”- Hizdahr zo Loraq

cards.name: Baelor Brightsmile
cards.text: Renown. Reaction: After you win a challenge by 5 or more STR in which Baelor Brightsmile is participating, reveal the top card of your deck. You may place that card on Baelor Brightsmile facedown as a duplicate.

cards.name: Enameled Green Armor
cards.text: Character you control only. Attached character gains renown. Challenges Action: During a challenge in which attached character is participating, kneel Enameled Green Armor to choose a participating character. That character contributes its STR to your side this challenge.

cards.name: Alleras the Sphinx
cards.text: Reaction: After you lose a challenge in which Alleras the Sphinx is participating, search the top 10 cards of your deck for a card, reveal it, and place it facedown under your agenda. Shuffle your deck.
cards.flavor: He had only been at the Citadel for a year, yet already he had forged three links of his maester's chain.

cards.name: Candle in the Dark
cards.text: Attached character cannot be bypassed by stealth. Interrupt: When the effects of a triggered card ability would initiate, if that card has shadow, kneel attached character to cancel those effects.

cards.name: A Meeting of Minds
cards.text: Each Small Council character you control gains insight.
cards.flavor: “He entrusts some small matters to us, to lighten his load.” - Varys

cards.name: The Doom of Valyria
cards.text: When Revealed: If there are 3 or more plot cards in your used pile, discard each non-limited card from play, and each card in shadows. An opponent may discard their hand (of at least 3 cards) to cancel this effect.
